unlekker.modelbuilder

Class UQuad

  • java.lang.Object
    • unlekker.modelbuilder.UFace
      • unlekker.modelbuilder.UQuad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<UFace>, processing.core.PConstants, UConstants

    public class UQuad
extends UFace
implements UConstants
    Stores information about quad geometry. Primarily intended to be a support class for UGeometry and UQuadStrip Stores vertices in the same order as a quad strip does: 0 == Bottom left, 1 == top left, 2 == bottom right, 3 == top right.
    Author:
    marius

      • extrude

        public void extrude(UGeometry geo,
           float inset,
           float extrusion,
           boolean isWindow)
        Creates a extruded pyramid-like geometry based on a quad, with the option to leave the front quad open to create a window effect.
        Parameters:
        geo - UGeometry instance where the generated geometry should be stored
        inset - Inset of the extruded face, will be overriden if the length l of any of the quad edges are less than inset (in which case inset=l/2-1 is used.) This is done to avoid self-intersecting geometry.
        extrusion - Extrusion factor for the the extruded face. No checking is undertaken to prevent intersections with other geometry.
        isWindow - Flag indicating whether to leave front face empty to create a window effect.
